means: 无人哀悼的，不被痛惜的

auth_sentence.content: Other songs have ageing rockers dying unmourned and a would-be suicide weighing up the pro's and con's of life.

auth_sentence.content: Control has died, taking his fears of betrayal to the grave, and unmourned except by Smiley, who lost his job not long afterward.
